divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife and i were fishing on the susquehanna river,when we notice one sphere north east of us.It was moving from north east to south west,at a very slow rate of speed.There were some thunder heads forming,that i was worried about and watching,that made me see the spheres.and it was up at that height.about 25,000 feet rough guess.It stopped and then that's when we saw 5 others to our south west,about the same height.they flew very slowly and then after about 25 min ,one after another just winked out.I finally see something and i don't have a camera.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bloomsburg
There were no other sightings in Bloomsburg on or around July 4th 2009
